title: Coronado National Memorial: Wildflowers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Wildflowers                Wildflowers         Pink-throated morning glory in bloom. (NPS photo by David Bly)  Coronado National Memorial has a subtle wildflower show throughout the spring and summer. Some of the showiest are the large blossoms of the pink-throated morning glories found along the roadside near the east entrance to the park.
